faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about MuchLove and video testimonials.

0.question: How does MuchLove work?
0.answer: MuchLove makes collecting video testimonials simple. You invite your happy customers via email, they click a link and record a short video directly in their browser â€” no app or account required. The testimonial is then available in your dashboard to share and embed.

1.question: What video formats are supported?
1.answer: MuchLove supports all major video formats including MP4 and WebM. Videos are recorded directly in the browser using standard web technologies, so they work on any modern device â€” desktop, tablet, or mobile.

2.question: Is MuchLove really free?
2.answer: Yes! Our Free plan includes up to 20 video testimonials, a basic embeddable widget, email invitations, and social sharing. No credit card required. Upgrade to Pro when you need unlimited testimonials and advanced features.

3.question: How do I embed the widget on my website?
3.answer: Simply copy one line of JavaScript code from your dashboard and paste it into your website's HTML. The widget automatically loads and displays your video testimonials in a beautiful, responsive carousel.

4.question: Is my data secure? Are you GDPR compliant?
4.answer: Absolutely. MuchLove is fully GDPR compliant. All data is encrypted, stored on European servers (Supabase), and we never share your data with third parties. Users can request data deletion at any time.

5.question: In how many languages is MuchLove available?
5.answer: MuchLove currently supports English, French, and Spanish. The entire experience â€” from email invitations to the recording interface to the embedded widget â€” is fully translated in all three languages.

6.question: Can I customize the widget?
6.answer: Yes! Pro users can customize the widget's colors, layout, number of testimonials displayed, and even remove the MuchLove branding. The widget is designed to blend seamlessly with your website's design.

7.question: How do my customers record their testimonial?
7.answer: Your customers receive an email with a unique link. They click it, land on a branded page, and record a 30-second to 2-minute video directly in their browser. No app download, no account creation â€” just one click and they're recording.
